/* [chn.bhmc.dms.cmm.nms.service.dao.NotificationTargetDAO.selectNotificationExcludeTargetsByCondition] */ SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM ,V1.ALRT_POLICY_GRP_NM ,V2.ALRT_POLICY_NM ,V4.USR_NM ,V3.* FROM CM_2101T V1 INNER JOIN CM_2102T V2 ON V1.ALRT_POLICY_GRP_ID = V2.ALRT_POLICY_GRP_ID INNER JOIN CM_2105T V3 ON V1.ALRT_POLICY_GRP_ID = V3.ALRT_POLICY_GRP_ID AND V2.ALRT_POLICY_ID = V3.ALRT_POLICY_ID INNER JOIN CM_0801T V4 ON V3.USR_ID = V4.USR_ID WHERE V1.ALRT_POLICY_GRP_ID = #{sAlrtPolicyGrpId} AND V2.ALRT_POLICY_ID = #{sAlrtPolicyId} ORDER BY
V3.USR_ID ASCDESC V4.USR_NM ASCDESC
V4.USR_ID ASC
V4.USR_ID ASC
